attributes.action: provide more help for the families who loose a loved one to a wreck less or dangerous driver.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A petition to encourage our government to provide more help to, those who loose family members to dangerous or wreck less drivers. These families should be provided with Bereavement counselling, along with more communication with police officers. 
At present the bereavement counselling provided by the NHS is inadequate as families can sometimes wait months before counselling is provided. 
Families also need more interaction with the police to be sure Justice is attained for their loved one.
